name: neuropy
tagline: A Python application for interactive analysis of sorted neuronal spike data and raw LFP waveforms
body:
![neuropy logo](images/logo.png)

The latest version is available in its [GitHub repository](http://github.com/neuropy/neuropy).

For more details, see the [README](https://github.com/neuropy/neuropy#readme).
